attributes.title: one word: TRASH
attributes.review: glitchy, broken, and unnecessary. messed up my phone, i deleted it and it still doesn’t work right. i could barely write this review. get this trash off the app store

attributes.title: So disappointed!
attributes.review: My infinite love for our fearless leader was hoping for another outlet besides Hannity.  This ain't it.  I want an app where I can support a constitutional change for Him to go beyond his upcoming second mandate.  Nothing less will do.

attributes.title: Believe me it’s incredible how terrible this app truly is
attributes.review: Terrible app, just awful. Probably the worst app I’ve ever seen, this is huge how bad this app really is. I know this because I am a jenius, I am a professional at technology.

attributes.title: Would have gave 0 if I could!
attributes.review: The first time I opened it I got a private message asking for nude pictures of myself! I’m under age!! If you ever thought that trump was a good person, you’re wrong!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up to date with our current President and all it is serving me is fake news and viruses! Not happy. Will be deleting app immediately and contacting the manager to complain further.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: aside from being a very poorly coded and developed app, The bigotry and racism along with other things that surrounds the Trump administration and the Trump themselves are despicable and very ugly. It's a joke of an app and an even bigger joke of a platform for the president to spread his propaganda.

attributes.title: HARRASMENT
attributes.review: Upon opening the app, I was immediately harassed with a question to receive notifications and I was completely offended. Then, there was a very offensive picture of a very orange Cheeto trying to punch me. I would not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: As a Donal lover myself🥰🥵😘😍 I was really excited for this app🤪😝 but I soon realized how awful it actually was💔🤢💀🤮 this app ruined my life, killed my mommas dogs sisters fish, caused a bug infestation in my kitchen and cat called me🤐🥴 10/10 do NOT recommend

attributes.title: Mate it’s garbage
attributes.review: I got saw my phone notification to get this app, and I did. The first thing I saw was an orange blob covering up my entire screen, and heard “we will build a wall” 0/10 would not recommend the Cheeto

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I got downloaded this app and it was horrible my phone started to act funny and the app took all my space it’s not worth having it’s a fugly app that deserves to be taken down 😤
